author: Rick Spilman
content: Indeed. One loose connection requiring a turn of wrench could be enough to turn an autonomous craft from operational to derelict or worse.

author: Peter Wright
content:
I have never seen a ship without technical problems. It will be a kind of Nirvana to have engineers and stewards without the troublesome ornaments on the mantelpiece who were always running into things and spoiling all of our fun with an air of unfounded superiority.

And there will be plenty of computers keeping a lookout for other computers in peril on the ocean wave.

author: Willy
content: Wondering if the coast guard gets to search it. My wild imagination sees this craft as a way to smuggle something. Or as a spy craft. No I dont subscribe to the paranoia that is out there. Just speculation on the possibilities with out oversight.
